member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Abstractions.Conditions.ICondition
member.summary: Defines predicate for selecting by some condition.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Abstractions.Conditions.ICondition.IsAccepted(Sitecore.XConnect.Contact)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified contact is accepted.
member.returns: true if the specified contact is accepted; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Abstractions.Conditions.IInteractionCondition
member.summary: Defines predicate for selecting by some condition.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Abstractions.Conditions.IInteractionCondition.IsAccepted(Sitecore.XConnect.Interaction)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified interaction is accepted.
member.returns: true if the specified interaction is accepted; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Abstractions.IUploadManager
member.summary: Defines an interface for uploading files into the storage specified in the registered profile.
